name: penny socks
notes:
**size**
eu 36-41

**measurements**
finished circumference: 20 cm / 7.9“ 
to fit a circumference of 19 - 21 cm / 7.5” - 8” 
length: customizable

**materials**
1 skein of friends sock wool color 27

**needles**
one set of 5 dpns 2.25 mm /us 1

**yarn quality**
friends sock wool, hobbii
75 % wool, 25 % polyamide
50 g / 01.75 oz = 210 m / 229 yds

**gauge**
30 sts x 39 rows = 10 cm x 10 cm / 4” x 4”

**pattern information**
with a simple top-down construction, a beautifully crafted lace that runs down the front of the foot, this sock will be nothing short of your new favourite.

penny is a beginner friendly sock pattern. though it uses dpns, it’s written in a way that you can use your preferred sock needle. the techniques used in the pattern are provided throughout, including abbreviations for the stitches used in the pattern. 

though this pattern is written with one cast on, it has a stretchiness that will allow for a wider foot. it fits approximately womens size 36/37 - 38/39 - 40/41. the length is customizable. you just knit until you are approximately 5 cm / 2” from your total foot length.
